mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp (ename, status, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno) VALUES ( #{ename}, #{status}::emp_status, #{job}, #{mgr}, #{hiredate}, #{sal}, #{comm}, #{deptno} )
mapper.select: SELECT empno, ename, status, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno FROM emp ORDER BY empno DESC
SELECT empno, ename, status::text, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno FROM emp WHERE empno = #{empno}
